column1: What is the definition of a farmer? someone who is outstanding in his field.
column3: In the joke, field refers to a piece of land used for agriculture (first meaning) and also refers to an area of expertise or profession (second meaning).
column4: The farmer planted corn in the field during the spring.
column5: She earned her degree in the field of environmental science.
